amendment.description: To modify the sense of Congress with respect to collaboration with other countries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 927 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 927 proposed by Senator Peters. (consideration: CR S4934; text: CR S4934) To modify the sense of Congress with respect to collaboration with other countries.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 927 proposed by Senator Peters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 927 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
